name: Manyaks
description:
XanderJam 2022

In this Jam we had to create a game with the theme "Survival of the fittest".

In Manyaks, play as a little guy who wants to get fit in the gym. He has to fight all the other gym bosses and if he wins, he'll be the strongest there.

Therefore it is survival of the fittest!

Controls

WASD - Movement

Mouse - Aim / Select / Punch

Space - Jump
